overview: Zahi returns from Germany to Lebanon to receive the corpse of his father  who was kidnapped in the Lebanese civil war for 35 years. When he goes to the hospital to collect  the corpse to bury it, he discovers that the corpse disappeared again. Zahi finds himself stuck between two worlds where he cannot relate or communicate with either of them while trying to explore the possibility of such a disappearance.
title: سلسلة اختفات وعلاقات غير مريحة
